item.description:
Join me for delicious Mexican food at Angela's, as seen on Food    Network’s television show “Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.”

From the website: http://angelascafeboston.com/

"Bienvenidos a Angela's Cafe!

Experience the wonder of the authentic Puebla cuisine. Their passion for the home-made is reflected in their intimate space and friendly atmosphere. You are welcome at Angela's Cafe to take part in a culinary trip to Puebla, Mexico and enjoy their traditional, regional dishes with a family touch."

 

To get there by train get off at the Airport stop on the blue line. Stay on Brooks Street and go past Chelsea, Bennington, and Saratoga Streets.  Angela's is on the corner of Brooks and Lexington.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a red sweater
item.name: Dinner At Angela's Cafe
